previewArticle.title: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York Red Bulls 2, New England Revolution 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Red Bulls and Revolution are underway at Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FREE Stream of the Week comin' in hot. Check it: http://t.co/lrePOlPAw1 #nofilter #NYvNE http://t.co/w17aLHjoLS

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #RBNY entered the game 5th in average possession at 52.4%, #NERevs 11th at 49.5%. #NYvNE. Red Bulls 70.7% early. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: christopher jennings
timelineItems.text: lets go #rbny

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Revs left a gaping hole in their defense, but BWP couldn’t turn the ball well enough to get a good shot off. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mac
timelineItems.text: Midfield isn't looking up to catch the runs, @TheRealBWP and @ThierryHenry have been open! #MLS #RBNY #NYvNE #soccer

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies gets played in on a good header from Bunbury, but Robles is out to smash it away quickly. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Matt Miazga tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: What a help Oyongo is going to be on the left side of midfield for #RBNY. He hugs the touchline, stretching out opposition's back four.

timelineItems.name: Yuuuuup
timelineItems.text: 90% of #RBNY passing this far had been between Segayka and Miazka.

timelineItems.name: Brian Turnbull
timelineItems.text: Nice night for the #NERevs vs Red Bulls game.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: So far everything #RBNY do is down the right flank. #NERevs RB Andrew Farrell has done well to stop just about everything coming his way.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 15' - #RBNY lead #MLS with 24 crosses per game. Hadn't attempted one tonight yet until that one was blocked just then. #NYvNE #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Red Bull trying to go up the right side early. Farrell has done a great job on defense so far #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ainslie Binder
timelineItems.text: How high did @Tim_Cahill just jump? #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jacob Martella
timelineItems.text: Surprisingly, despite that losing streak, #NERevs still in a playoff spot, one point ahead of #NYRB. Makes this a big match. #NYvNE #MLS

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Defenders know they can maul Charlie because he won’t get the call. Another example just now. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 0, New England Revolution 1. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Charlie Davies heads in a nice cross

timelineItems.name: JerseyJon.com
timelineItems.text: Hard not to look at #RBNY Starting XI and cringe at those CBs. Oh, Marcus Holggersson, where didst though go? #NYvNE #Revolution

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) has gone down, but that's a dive.

timelineItems.name: Devin Pleuler
timelineItems.text: Traveling support in the house. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Bobby's distribution has always been pretty awful. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 2, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BWP delivers 2-1 win for shorthanded #RBNY with this beaut: http://t.co/9EqAmanXey #NYvNE http://t.co/NQTLwDdQ6u

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls and New England Revolution renew their I-95 rivalry when the clubs face off at Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution | August 2, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two exquisite goals see 10-man #RBNY nab come-from-behind win. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/DuIMDNr6Ei #NYvNE http://t.co/dqwD1vbTal

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: You give him a yellow, he'll give us a goal! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tolmich
timelineItems.text: The #NERevs make it 1-0 via Charlie Davies, who was left wide open on the backpost to head home a deflection.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Revs are 7-0-0 this year when scoring first. Red Bulls are 0-5-7 when conceding first. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: That's @CharlieDavies9 first goal with the #NERevs and his first @MLS goal since Sept. 10, 2011 when he had a hat trick vs. Chivas USA.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Lanigan
timelineItems.text: Another great move from Bunbury to fake inside and go back outside. Nearly scored against the Crew in similar fashion. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Lee Nguyen tries a through ball, but Kevin Alston is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: New England Revolution
timelineItems.text: That's @chuckdeezy9 putting the #NERevs on the board!

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Teal and Charlie have shown good chemistry in the last two games #NERevs

timelineItems.name: James J Pepe
timelineItems.text: Did #NYRB really think their defenders were good enough before the season started? This lot is terrible.

timelineItems.name: Michael West
timelineItems.text: #NERevs have owned the first 20 minutes of this match.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Thierry Henry's curling chip sails wide

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Bradley Wright-Phillips.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #RBNY were loss #2 in the #NERevs 8 game losing streak, could they also be win #2 in a new Revs winning streak? #NYvNE #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Charlie Davies.

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: That was panic. Ugh. Good pressure shutting it down. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Ibrahim Sekagya tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Mario Romilio
timelineItems.text: I'll tell you what, we got something pretty special in @OyongoA #RBNY

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: I think I need another $12 beer #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Michelle McCrary
timelineItems.text: Oyongo is a young player who is ready. Miazga is not. Someday just not today. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles gets down to stop the nifty A.J. Soares flick

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Robles' save on A.J Soares

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodwin
timelineItems.text: So we're just a gonna put everyone behind the ball now Heaps??? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Michelle McCrary
timelineItems.text: Lil Duvall is ready. I think Bover is ready. Lots of other players are ready.... #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Scott Caldwell.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: HOW IS THAT NOT A PENALTY?!?! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: That's not shoulder to shoulder. That's a body check. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Kelyn Rowe drills a shot wide

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tolmich
timelineItems.text: #NERevs head coach Jay Heaps is livid on the touchline, as is defender Andrew Farrell after a no-call as Kelyn Rowe goes down in the box.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - NY and NE have only played two consecutive #MLS games without a red card issued to one side since the start of 2010. Heated. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: djones07070
timelineItems.text: Feels good to be back, even if for a night. #redbullarena #runwithus #rba #rbny #mls

timelineItems.name: David Hirx
timelineItems.text: Think I've seen as many @Arsenal shirts at RBA tonight as for the pink cows. If for no other reason Go @NERevolution! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kurtis Burke
timelineItems.text: It's game time people!!!! #NeRevs

timelineItems.name: Michael West
timelineItems.text: BEAT #RBNY.

timelineItems.name: thirdbaseproductions
timelineItems.text: Red Bull Arena for the NE Revolution vs. Red Bulls MLS game stop one summer vacation #NERevs #redbulls #summervacation

timelineItems.name: Jeffrey Phillips
timelineItems.text: Chris Duvall. The #RBNY enforcer

timelineItems.name: Marc Larocque
timelineItems.text: that smash on rowe is going in the mls big hits mix tape #nerevs nfl-style

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Revs have been back-heel crazy the past 2 games but it has been working for them #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kyle Garrett
timelineItems.text: #NERevs looking really dynamic with Davies up top.

timelineItems.name: Katie Mattaini
timelineItems.text: Sooooo pretty. Too bad it wasn't quite a goal. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kevin Alston (New England Revolution).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tolmich
timelineItems.text: #RBNY most common choice of attack have been through balls over the top for BWP. Revs goalkeeper Shuttleworth has gobbled them all up.

timelineItems.name: RBNYTweets (Matt)
timelineItems.text: We desperately miss Olave #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Early controversial moment, as Davies is given a yellow for simulation after being nipped by Sekagya in penalty area. #RBNY #NERevs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: On replay, looks like Sekagya did whack him in the shins, but was practically already airborne. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Luis Robles.

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Scotty in unfamiliar territory. But need more runs like that. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: #NERevs have a lot of fun working on Matt Miazga.

timelineItems.name: Once A Metro
timelineItems.text: Oyongo....Christ. That ball was great. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Lloyd Sam with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Mariner warning #NERevs about Henry, BWP, and Cahill. That's why he gets the big bucks.

timelineItems.text: First MLS goal for Charlie Davies since Sept. 10, 2011: http://t.co/m8hKRnaaaI #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by José Gonçalves.

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: My #RBNY rally towel is now a stress ball.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by José Gonçalves.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Looks like the good JoGo is back! #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo tries a through ball, but Thierry Henry is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: The Bent Musket
timelineItems.text: ...and then Bobby lucky on the second corner. Living dangerously. #NERevs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: This game is proving how important Sam's attacking play is. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Foul by Matt Miazga (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.desc: Foul by Matt Miazga (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: One set of rules for Thierry Henry, another set of rules for everyone else. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Matt Miazga (New York Red Bulls).
Delay in match Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Chapman was quick to his book in the 2nd minute for a poor simulation call. Seems to have lost his yellow since. #NYvNE #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Matt Miazga (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: Miazga should be sent off for that challenge. Chapman has missed a lot in this game, but he gets this right. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ainslie Binder
timelineItems.text: That's a shame. After signaling advantage? #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 0, New England Revolution 1.
Second Half begins New York Red Bulls 0, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 1. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dax McCarty pokes in a sweet floater over Shuttleworth

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tolmich
timelineItems.text: Announced that Cahill suffering from groin tightness #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Mario Romilio
timelineItems.text: I always try to look for positives, but there are none right now. Tactics are poor, we don't like a team right now. We look bad #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Wow. Poor clearance by the Revs but a great shot by McCarty. Just a high quality finish. 1-1 now #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Nick Chávez
timelineItems.text: Wow, classy chip from @DaxMcCarty11 for #RBNY. Great goal.

timelineItems.name: John-Michael Monroy
timelineItems.text: Come back time #nyrb #nosebleeds #dax #wonderstrike

timelineItems.name: Bob Zeserson
timelineItems.text: A good 45 minutes flushed down the toilet in a matter of 2 minutes #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls).
Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Wow, that’s a big stop from Robles in traffic on a corner kick. SOTW nominee, probably. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: So close for Farrell. He wanted that one. Golden opportunity early that Revs can't convert on #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Russell McKenzie
timelineItems.text: Yes. More of that please. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Samuel T. Ross
timelineItems.text: NYRB #NYRB #mls

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: YOU ARE UP A MAN. Play like it! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: a_sakowski
timelineItems.text: Is Alston on a tryout for a #NYRB winger spot? #NYvNE #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: 10-man #RBNY controlling the game early in the second half.

timelineItems.name: Michelle McCrary
timelineItems.text: This is the team I love. Guts and heart. Let's go. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Fast counter, Oyongo takes a crack, and Henry nearly slides it home, but NE knocks it out for a corner. Electric stuff from NY. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Andrew G.
timelineItems.text: Am I the only #RBNY fan that thinks Duvall kinda looks like Wayne Brady?

timelineItems.name: RevGunner
timelineItems.text: Which team is a man down again? #NERevs or #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Mullins and Fagundez checking into the game for the Revolution, who are up a man despite it not looking that way currently. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Luis Robles.
Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).
Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Katie Mattaini
timelineItems.text: Teal, you guys are wearing blue today. Stop passing to the white shirts please. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: Great job tonight Davies! #NERevs 👏

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Robles almost messed that up. Good job to recover on the good shot by Rowe #NERevs

timelineItems.name: just tolstoy
timelineItems.text: Cahill cannot be allowed to participate in all star game #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Chris Gengaro
timelineItems.text: Game time. #nyrb @newyorkredbulls

timelineItems.name: Will Northrup
timelineItems.text: To be clear: he's not a championship caliber keeper. That said, Bobby is not awful either. Definition of mediocre. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 2, New England Revolution 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips wraps in a beauty

timelineItems.name: Justin Copenhaver
timelineItems.text: I've never had faith in Heaps in game management, and today is not helping that at all. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Davies led all #NERevs with 90% passing accuracy and three shots when he was subbed out. #NYvNE #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin Alston.

timelineItems.name: Matt Rosenfeld
timelineItems.text: Wow. Bradley Wright Phillips scores his league leading 18th goal of the season and the man down #RBNY are up 2-1. Impressive.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Lanigan
timelineItems.text: Goal of the week stuff from Bradley Wright-Phillips. #NERevs #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: zombigrind9
timelineItems.text: You down with #BWP? #rbny #runwithus #sec202 t-10

timelineItems.name: Tom Howard
timelineItems.text: It's like I am watching two totally different Red Bulls teams... NY 2-1 NE #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: Shep Messing, who played in the 1970s, just described this year's #RBNY as "the craziest team I've ever seen."

timelineItems.name: The Bent Musket
timelineItems.text: Can't blame Chapman now, this is entirely on the #NERevs. Horrible, awful, no-good performance.

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: They've got players that impact the game. We've got a team full of vanilla. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Erik Abarca
timelineItems.text: That was one hell of halftime speech from the looks of it. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: #NERevs completely falling apart. This is where Nguyen really needs to get this team to calm down and get their heads on straight.

timelineItems.text: Shuttleworth with 29% passing accuracy thus far for #NERevs. #NYvNE
As you know, #RBNY have yet to win a game this year when conceding the 1st goal. Streaks were made to be broken right?

timelineItems.text: I know it has worked, but have to think that Petke might be better served to insert defender to protect lead. #RBNY still w 3-man back line.

timelineItems.text: Cruel and unusual to their fans. #NERevs

timelineItems.text: Still up a man right? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Jason Iapicco
timelineItems.text: This may sound strange, but I feel like going down to 10 men has de-cluttered the field for #RBNY, so to speak.

timelineItems.name: Taylor Sturm
timelineItems.text: There's a #NYRB player open on the wing every single time. McCarty and Henry refuse to pass to wings. Don't get it.

timelineItems.text: Game feels like it has another goal in it. #NYvNE #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Jonathan McHugh
timelineItems.text: Best day ever #RedBullArenA #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Amy Arden
timelineItems.text: Substitute. Substitute now. Before it's too late. #rbny

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Luyindula on for Wright-Phillips. Red Bulls now playing a four-man back line with Miller at CB and Oyongo at LB. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Chris Duvall.

timelineItems.name: Mark Purkis
timelineItems.text: beyond frustrated. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Mac
timelineItems.text: Bulls look sloppy today and can't get the ball into the offensive third. We need to wake up #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Matthew DiPierro
timelineItems.text: #NERevs announcers saying Davies not the kind of guy who dives. Maybe they didn't watch him at DC, the guy has a reputation unfortunately

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: Nope, Bunbury goes to RB and Farrell to CB. Heaps going for it. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.

timelineItems.name: Christian Suleiman
timelineItems.text: I have achieved nirvana #RBNY  @therealbar0n @sooothereiwas @jonny_boy27

timelineItems.name: Chris Goodwin
timelineItems.text: How does Teal miss that completely??? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: No it's ok. Don't worry about these balls rolling out the back. Not like we're low on time. #NERevs
HUGE final 10 minutes here. Just keep possession and don't concede! #RBNY #COYRB

timelineItems.desc: Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Kelyn  Rowe gets booked for a late challenge

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
Chris Duvall (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Kosuke Kimura about to come on for #RBNY's final sub.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Lee Nguyen bangs a bouncer wide

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Tonight's attendance is 20,862 at Red Bull Arena. #NYvNE #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Brad Burns
timelineItems.text: In case anyone has forgotten, #NERevs are playing up a man.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi.

timelineItems.desc: Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the right post with a left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Peguy Luyindula whips a shot off the far post

timelineItems.desc: Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the right post with a left footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: REPLAY: Peguy Luyindula bangs a shot off the post

timelineItems.name: Kimberly Irene
timelineItems.text: Awwwwww yeah #rbny #becausefutbol #secondhalf #allin #soccer

timelineItems.name: DC Revs Fan
timelineItems.text: I like Caldwell and I like Dorman. But we need a CDM. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the right post with a left footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: just tolstoy
timelineItems.text: HUGE 5+ minutes for this season #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Daigo Kobayashi (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Scott Caldwell.

timelineItems.name: Matt Fedorka
timelineItems.text: #NYRB supporters pretty much silent all game until they went up. We're still just as loud as at kickoff. #NERevs have the best supporters.

timelineItems.name: Mr. Boots and Pants
timelineItems.text: Ohhhh Peguy. Could have ended his game. What a setup from Henry. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Max Fischer
timelineItems.text: What a broken team. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: BENJAMERICA
timelineItems.text: Watching Bobby go "did I just concede another goal?" just made me laugh really loud. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.

timelineItems.name: the Lorde, your Gawd
timelineItems.text: Thierry has another year left. #rbny

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Kevin Alston tries a through ball, but Patrick Mullins is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: christina arkous
timelineItems.text: Let's go @NewYorkRedBulls take this one tonight #RBNY #RunWithUs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Will heaps salute the fans? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Four minutes of stoppage time to find an equalizer. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Kosuke Kimura.

timelineItems.name: Michael West
timelineItems.text: This HAS to be the most frustrating game of the season by FAR, #NERevs.

timelineItems.name: Tyler de Ruiter
timelineItems.text: You'd think the Red Bulls are 2 men up on this #NERevs squad. #Backwards

timelineItems.name: Miles Halpine
timelineItems.text: Let's go, Revs. It's now or never. #NYvNE #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Patrick Mullins (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Daigo Kobayashi.
Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Kevin Alston (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) with an attempt from very close range is too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Kevin Alston misses a good chance to equalize

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls).
Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Ibrahim Sekagya.
Attempt missed. Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) with an attempt from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Kelyn Rowe with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Dan Clarke
timelineItems.text: Teams should just concede corners all day to the #nerevs. Are set pieces even practiced?

timelineItems.name: Ginger Beard
timelineItems.text: This is why I didn't allow myself to get to excited after Wednesday. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Marios C Sfantos Esq
timelineItems.text: My MVP is @DaxMcCarty11 & also whole team! Bravo to @NewYorkRedBulls for showing such character. #RBNY deserve win. A win that turns season!

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 2, New England Revolution 1.
